titles.secondary: Rachel Furness: Graft, goals and glory
titles.entity_title: Rachel Furness: Graft, goals and glory

synopses.short: Rachel Furness joins us just after announcing her retirement and she doesn’t hold back.
synopses.long:
Rachel Furness joins us just after announcing her retirement and she doesn’t hold back. 

From growing up as a little girl listening to Newcastle games on the radio, to playing at St James’ Park, this is the full-circle story of a record-breaking player who never gave up. 

She opens up about injuries, setbacks, Northern Ireland, Alan Shearer, Kevin Keegan, and what it’s really going to take for NUFC Women to close the gap.

titles.secondary: Behind the Decks and the Dugout: DJ Schak
titles.entity_title: Behind the Decks and the Dugout: DJ Schak

synopses.short: This week we’re joined by Northeast DJ and massive Newcastle United fan, Schak.
synopses.long: This week we’re joined by Northeast DJ and massive Newcastle United fan, Schak. From performing on the pitch at St James’ to acting alongside Sam Fender, we talk music, Magpies, and how far both his career and the club have come. A conversation that brings together football, music culture, and identity in the North East.

titles.secondary: The Tyne-Wear Derby: It's more than football
titles.entity_title: The Tyne-Wear Derby: It's more than football

synopses.short: A special episode looking back on more than a century of Newcastle-Sunderland rivalry.
synopses.long: The Premier League derbies are back! But it's a rivalry that dates back to the English Civil War and runs a lot deeper than football. Total Sport's Simon Pryde takes us through how the derby began, the moments that have gone down in history - and what the derby means to the players, fans and to the North East as a region.

titles.secondary: Paul Ferris: Shearer, Sir Bobby & King Kev
titles.entity_title: Paul Ferris: Shearer, Sir Bobby & King Kev

synopses.short: Paul Ferris joins Raul for a brilliant chat about life inside Newcastle United.
synopses.long: Paul Ferris joins Raul Kohli for a brilliant chat about life inside Newcastle United. From his bond with Shearer to hilarious tales of Sir Bobby Robson and what it was really like playing under Keegan. Packed with great memories, moments that stay with you, and stories you won’t have heard before.

titles.secondary: End of Season Wrap - Champions League & Derby Dreams
titles.entity_title: End of Season Wrap - Champions League & Derby Dreams

synopses.short: It’s the end-of-season NUFC special!
synopses.long: It’s the end-of-season NUFC special! We crown our unsung hero, pick the play of the year, and look back at a rollercoaster season. With Champions League football secured (cheers, Man U) and the Tyne-Wear derby back on the cards, we look ahead to summer signings and what’s next for the Toon.
